IZ*ONE

Introduction

Lee Chaeyeon is a South Korean singer and dancer, best known as a member of the project group IZ*ONE. She debuted with the group following her participation in the second season of Produce 48. Chaeyeon was recognized as the main dancer, lead vocalist, and lead rapper of the group. Prior to joining IZONE, she competed on JYP Entertainment's survival show "SIXTEEN," where she participated with her sister, ITZY's Chaeryeong.

Chaeyeon officially debuted as a member of IZ*ONE on October 29, 2018, with the release of their first mini-album COLOR*IZ. The group gained significant success during their promotions, which lasted until their disbandment on April 29, 2021.

After IZ*ONE's disbandment, Chaeyeon participated in the Mnet dance survival show Street Woman Fighter, where she finished in 7th place. She made her solo debut on October 12, 2022, with the release of her first mini-album HUSH RUSH. The album's single quickly ranked on various music platforms, including Bugs, Melon, Genie, and iTunes. The music video for the single also garnered significant attention, surpassing 10 million views within four days of its release.

In 2023, Chaeyeon participated in the Mnet survival show Queendom Puzzle, but she left the competition due to personal reasons.

Lee Chae Yeon is sisters with ITZY's Chaeryeong.

2
Lee Chae Yeon is the first 'Artist of the Month' featured on STUDIO CHOOM's new series. She released a cover of Stefflon Don's 16 Shots.
…
3
Lee Chae Yeon's cherished item 1 pick is barley tea. She can carry it around every day. Rather than water, she likes barley tea better.
…
4
Lee Chae Yeon would like for fans to call her 'mitbochae' as a nickname that combines her name and her goal to become an idol that no one can skip the channel (“no channel skip idol”).
…
5
For her debut title track, Lee Chae Yeon refers to herself as ‘MZ Vampire’ during the promotion period. As an MZ, a combination of Gen Z and Millennials, she represents a vampire that values confidence, transparency, authenticity, and social good while confidently expressing herself uniquely without the bounds of the existing framework.
…
6
Lee Chae Yeon is the performance director of the choreography for her debut song, 'HUSH RUSH'.

Lee Chae Yeon's favorite sport is badminton.
